title: Avari Nyx
description: Book 3 of the Champions Series.Despite being damaged and fragile, Annabelle Maddox is a woman to be reckoned with, who just needs some time off. Our third champion, she does us proud as both a survivor and an adapter. Tarun Bien is her assigned keeper on her new world, and he definitely wants to keep an eye on this human. If only the Avari Nyx would arrive, he could finally act on his impulses. He has one week to convince her that they just might have a destiny together. Wish him luck.
author: Viola Grace
